headline: Palo Alto Networks, Inc. (PANW): A Bear Case Theory
summary: We came across a bearish thesis on Palo Alto Networks, Inc. (PANW) on Substack by Magnus Ofstad. In this article, we will summarize the bears’ thesis on PANW. Palo Alto Networks, Inc. (PANW)’s share was trading at $182.32 as of March 21st. PANW’s trailing and forward P/E were 103.01 and 56.18 respectively according to Yahoo Finance. Cybersecurity […]
